channel.title: How to make a new place ( like make home at rock crabs)
channel.description: sorry for my noobish i just started and need help on this i bin through client and stuff but not sure what to do "/ :confused:

item.title: How to make a new place ( like make home at rock crabs)
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

[code]well ok ima tell you the easiest 1 pk one is difficult because then you have to remove safezones ok what you is go into your client.java and search for makeGlobalObject and stop till you find somthing like this makeGlobalObject(9398, 3706, 564, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2974, 3372, 2783, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2940, 3353, 2109, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2940, 3352, 2109, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2940, 3351, 2091, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2940, 3350, 2094, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2940, 3349, 2093, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2940, 3348, 2097, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2940, 3347, 2103, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2940, 3346, 2105, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2993, 3375, 2470, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3177, 3420, 10638, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(3088, 3483, 6552, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3381, 3485, 410, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2587, 3911, 4755, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2900, 2905, 13180, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2740, 5103, 13181, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2900, 2915, 13179, 0, 10);
and no there not the same this is your the list of all your objects makeGlobalObject(2900, 2905, 13180, 0, 10); ass you can see 2900 and 2905 are your cords 2900 is the x cord and 2905 is the y cord and 13180 is the object id so what you would do is get the positon that where you want to find the the object the x and y cords some client will say it ,but if some dont what you want to do is try doing ::mypos ::posme ::pos with rights set to 3 and get your postion make a new makeGlobalObject(x pos, y pos, id, direction, 10);[/code] so yeah need more help send me a email or im me at t3hrunescapechannel@hotmail.com[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2009, 11:25:23 am[/size][hr]oh and if you could rep me that would make me happy thanks

Read full topic
